name: The Last Olympian
description:
Battle through encounters as an Olympian with a squad of soldiers, casting spells and accumulating power in order to defeat the Titans and prevent the apocalypse

Contributors:

  • queens38 : https://queens38.itch.io/ - pixel art and general art direction
  • E Fowl - sfx, music, and narration
  • cclark - programming and game design
  • deejai - programming and game design
  • RoysBoys - voice acting
  • Ryan Derr- voice acting
